name: Polkadot
body:
### About

Polkadot is the extensible heterogeneous multi-chain protocol.

### More

Find out more about Polkadot:

- read the [Polkadot Paper](https://github.com/polkadot-io/polkadotpaper/raw/master/PolkaDotPaper.pdf);
- contribute to the draft on [Github](https://github.com/polkadot-io/polkadotpaper);
- chat about it on [Gitter](https://gitter.im/polkadot-io/Lobby#).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
